title: Can't select Vayne's Chroma
body: Just bought it and I can't select it in the skin section.

replies.body:
Hiya, 

Were you in a Team Builder queue, or another? We're currently investigating issues with Team Builder queues and chromas.

I was able to purchase the chromas, hop in a custom, pick the red chroma, and load in with the red chroma successfully in a custom game.

I was testing it in an AI-begginer game when it was just released. It works the third time when I tried at about 3:30 pm pst.

So it works now, thanks for the reply.
I bought it and i can't use it for some reason... like i can select it but when i enter game it just doesn't work.
